feed.title: Swift Mailer PEAR channel Latest Releases

entry.title: Swift 4.0.7 (stable)
entry.content: Swift Mailer integrates into any web app written in PHP 5, offering a flexible and elegant object-oriented approach to sending emails with a multitude of features.
